name: Di Huang 0001
content: ï»¿ Di Huang Di Huang  (é» è¿ª) Ph.D., Professor, IEEE Senior Member and CCF/CAAI Distinguished Member Intelligent Recognition and Image Processing Lab School of Computer Science and Engineering Beihang University (formerly known as Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, BUAA) Address: Room G906, New Main Building, No.37, Xueyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing, China, 100191 Tel.: +86-10-82316379;  Email: dhuang (at) buaa (dot) edu (dot) cn [Work Experience][Education][Research Interests][Publications][Projects][Professional Activities][Teaching][Honors and Awards][Hobbies] Homepage News [More] Our paper, titled âAST-Adapter: Parameter-Efficient Video-to-Video Transfer Learning with Adaptive Spatiotemporal Information Biasâ is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology (21 Nov. 2025). Our proposal for organizing FG 2027 is accepted, where I will serve as a Program Chair. It is the first time that FG is hosted in Africa. Wish a big success for Marrakech (12 Nov. 2025). Our paper, titled âRMAdapter: Reconstruction-based Multi-Modal Adapter for Vision-Language Modelsâ is accepted for Oral Presentation by AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, 2026 (8 Nov. 2025). Our paper, titled âSceneGenesis: 3D Scene Synthesis via Semantic Structural Priors and Mesh-Guided Video-Geometry Fusionâ is accepted by AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, 2026 (8 Nov. 2025). Our paper, titled âImplicit Modeling for Transferability Estimation of Vision Foundation Modelsâ is accepted by Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, 2025 (18 Sep. 2025). Our paper, titled âTest-Time Adaptive Object Detection with Foundation Modelâ is accepted by Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, 2025 (18 Sep. 2025). Work Experience 2020.12~Present, Professor, Intelligent Recognition and Image Processing Lab (IRIP), School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE), Beihang University (BUAA). 2024.11~2024.12, Visiting Scholar, DÃ©partement MathÃ©matiques Informatique (MI), Ecole Centrale de Lyon (ECL). 2019.01~2019.02, Visiting Scholar, DÃ©partement MathÃ©matiques Informatique (MI), Ecole Centrale de Lyon (ECL). 2017.01~2017.02, Visiting Scholar, DÃ©partement MathÃ©matiques Informatique (MI), Ecole Centrale de Lyon (ECL). 2015.08~2020.11, Associate Professor, Intelligent Recognition and Image Processing Lab (IRIP), School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE), Beihang University (BUAA). 2014.09~2015.01, Visiting Scholar, Department of Computer and Information Science (CIS), Faculty of Science and Technology (FST), University of Macau (UM). 2014.01~2014.04, Visiting Scholar, Biometrics Research Centre (BRC), Department of Computing (COMP), Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU). 2011.12~2015.07, Assistant Professor, Intelligent Recognition and Image Processing Lab (IRIP), School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE), Beihang University (BUAA). Education 2008~2011, Ph.D. in DÃ©partement MathÃ©matiques Informatique (Department of Mathematics and Computer Science), Ecole Centrale de Lyon, Lyon, France. 2005~2008, M.S. in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Beihang University, Beijing, China. 2001~2005, B.S. in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Beihang University, Beijing, China. Research Interests Computer Vision; Representation Learning; Generative AI; Embodied AI; etc. Selected Publications [Google Scholar] Books/Book Chapters: D. Huang and H.
